chunks.chunk_text: Hello 同情家族歡迎收聽 Look Back Sunday回顧星期天在這個節目John老師會彙整過去一年不同國家與主題的熱門更多文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收2020年最精華的世界時事趣聞我們這週看看歐洲的趣聞喔Let's get right to it
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS 歐洲趣聞 All about Europe.json

chunks.chunk_text: Belgium is the world's largest exporter of fries and other frozen potato products.It's processes converting 5.3 million tons of potatoes into fries, mash and crisps per year and sending them to customers in more than one year.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS 歐洲趣聞 All about Europe.json

chunks.chunk_text: Restrictions to halt the spread of the coronavirus have forced the closure of cafes and restaurants.The industry's prime customers for fries and processing firms have seen demand fall by as much as 80%.We know Belgians like their fries.It's intangible heritage, our frying culture.So we ask Belgians to consume an extra portion of fries
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS 歐洲趣聞 All about Europe.json

chunks.chunk_text: to allow us to process more potatoes and to avoid food waste.Romain Coules,Secretary General of Industry Group,Belgapan told Reuters TV.Next article
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS 歐洲趣聞 All about Europe.json

chunks.chunk_text: Barbara Pompili,France's Minister of Ecological Transition said in a news conference on Tuesday last week that bears,tigers,lions,elephants and other wild animals will no longer be allowed in traveling circuses in the coming years.In addition,she said that starting immediately,France's three marine parks will no longer
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS 歐洲趣聞 All about Europe.json

chunks.chunk_text: be able to bring in or breed dolphins and killer whales.It is time to open a new era in our relationship with these wild animals, she said, arguing that animal welfare is a priority.Pompili said the measures will also bring an end to mink farming, in which animals are raised for their fur within the next five years.The ban does not apply to wild animals in other permanent shows and in zoos.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS 歐洲趣聞 All about Europe.json

chunks.chunk_text: The French government will provide an aid package of more than 8 million euros,that is 9.36 million US dollars,to help animal shows transition to a new business model.Around 20 European countries have already banned or limited the presence of wild animals in circuses.In France,many cities already do not allow circuses with wild animal shows to pitch their tents.Next article
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS 歐洲趣聞 All about Europe.json

chunks.chunk_text: Rebecca Lee,25,has suddenly found herself shut out of the labour market as the economic toll of the pandemic intensifies.Her job as a personal assistant at a London architecture firm was eliminated in September.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS 歐洲趣聞 All about Europe.json

chunks.chunk_text: The coronavirus pandemic is rapidly fueling a new youth unemployment crisis in Europe.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS 歐洲趣聞 All about Europe.json

chunks.chunk_text: The jobless rate for people 25 and under jumped from 14.7 percent in January to 17.6 percent in August,its highest level since 2011.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS 歐洲趣聞 All about Europe.json

chunks.chunk_text: 歐洲不是唯一的地方讓年輕的工作人員面臨職業爭執年輕美國人特別受到下降但在歐洲,疫情的經濟影響將整個世代都放在危險的位置根據經濟合作和發展組織
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS 歐洲趣聞 All about Europe.json

chunks.chunk_text: 學生們面臨著不可預期的競爭甚至是從新的工作人員面臨的進階級位置甚至是從新的工作人員面臨的進階級位置甚至是從新的工作人員面臨的進階級位置
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS 歐洲趣聞 All about Europe.json

chunks.chunk_text: 但這些項目可能沒有太大影響因為歐洲已經在世界二戰爭執的最嚴重的時期面臨歐洲人在疫情期間的年齡下降了他們的工作和職業的期望許多人在學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨學生面臨
